name.ja: <ruby>星辰竜<rt>ドラゴンテイル</rt></ruby>パーン

text.en: If this card is sent to the GY as material for a Fusion Summon: You can Set 1 "Dragon Tale" Spell/Trap from your Deck, then you can destroy 1 monster on the field. If a face-up Fusion Monster(s) you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect while this card is in your GY: You can place this card on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 non-Fusion "Dragon Tale" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Dragon Tale Parn" once per turn.
